mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, password, name, birthdate, image, email_id, email_domain, token, is_active, join_date, type, nickname, sex, area, phone_number, mbti) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birthdate}, #{image}, #{emailId}, #{emailDomain}, #{token}, #{isActive}, #{joinDate}, #{type}, #{nickname}, #{sex}, #{area}, #{phoneNumber}, #{mbti})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, id, password, name, birthdate, image, email_id, email_domain, token, is_active, join_date, type, nickname, sex, area, phone_number, mbti FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
